welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Soham, a charming town known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our delightful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marham RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Marham RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
